hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #the Claim Check# and #a Map#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the Lizalfos in Dodongo's Cavern like to play in lava.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Mirror Shield# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #the Requiem of Spirit#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Hylian Shield#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #8# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Hylian Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Blue Fire Arrows# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.
